## Topic

Which lab, dataset, or script is unclear?

## Question

Describe what you need clarified. Include context, snippets, or screenshots.

## What You Tried

List steps, documentation, or resources you already checked.

## Additional Context

Anything else reviewers should know (environment, deadlines, blockers, etc.).
